EmailTemplate.subject: Your invitation to The Challenge Information Evening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Find out more about your NCS with The Challenge programme
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name} and {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope we can find {!Contact.FirstName} a place on NCS with The Challenge soon this autumn, and will keep you updated on programme availability.
In the meanwhile, you are both warmly invited to a short information evening about NCS with The Challenge, where you can meet fellow parents and participants, and ask us any questions. Please also use this evening as an opportunity to bring any outstanding medical forms or payments.
The information evening will take place on {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Date__c} at {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_time__c} at {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_venue_and_address__c}. The evening will last approximately one hour, and there will be a short presentation beginning within 15 minutes of this start time. Please arrive promptly so that we are able to start on time.
Please confirm your attendance by emailing {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_SC_email_address__c} or by calling me on {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_mobile_number__c}. You can also use this opportunity to ask any questions you may have regarding this evening or the programme in general.
We may also be holding an additional information evening on another day that week for people taking part from different areas, so if you cannot make this one, but would like to meet us, then please contact us for details.
This event is for parents/guardians and the prospective participant, however if you would like to bring along somebody else you think might be interested in the programme, we would be happy to welcome them and discuss finding them a place too. Please let us know when you confirm your attendance.
We are very excited about the prospect of {!Contact.FirstName} taking part in NCS with The Challenge and hope to see you at the information evening.
Yours sincerely,
{!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c}
